short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the majestic beauty of nature to your browser with Mountain Serenity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This stunning background features towering mountain peaks set against a serene blue sky and lush green patches growing on volcanic black sand. It's the perfect combination of tranquility and natural grandeur to inspire calm and focus during your browsing sessions. Let your mind wander to this peaceful landscape, whether you're at work or relaxing online.
